description.abstract: Test of @table-related features that do not work in LaTeX, only in HTML.
description.detailed:
Test that everything within @cell tag is OK:
Anything within a cell is OK, including lists:
One
Two
Three
, paragraphs: This is new paragraph. Dashes: ---, --, -, --. URLs: http://pasdoc.sourceforge.net/ And, last but not least, nested table:
1 2
3 4
B
C D
Now the same example table as before, but now nested table and other nicies are within a normal row, instead of heading row.
C D
Anything within a cell is OK, including lists:
One
Two
Three
, paragraphs: This is new paragraph. Dashes: ---, --, -, --. URLs: http://pasdoc.sourceforge.net/ And, last but not least, nested table:
1 2
3 4
B
